title: Oxfordshire Live: Murder probe after child found dead - BBC News
summary: murder investigation after young boy found dead at property in faringdon .
residents lay flowers outside cottage where he was found .
post-mortem examination to take place this afternoon .
high-achieving teenagers from wales to have chance to sample life at oxford university .
proposal to create one authority for oxfordshire to be submitted to the government .

documents.title: good evening
text: thanks for joining bbc local live for oxfordshire today .
our service resumes tomorrow at 08:00 .
author: Dave Gilyeat
BBC South

text: detectives investigating the shooting of a 17-year-old boy in kettering are appealing to the public to help identify men who may have links to the thames valley area .
author: Banbury Guardian

documents.title: weather : 'dry for most '
text: clear spells this evening will lead to some patches of mist and fog forming in the early hours , although it will stay dry for most .
minimum temperature : 5c ( 41f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: mini plant workers protest outside building
text: bmw workers at the mini plant in cowley have been protesting today over plans to close their final salary pension scheme .
voting for possible industrial action is also under way .

text: organisers of the henley show are counting the cost of poor weather , after a smaller than usual number of visitors last year .
author: Henley Standard

documents.title: murder probe as child found dead
text: murder probe as child found dead

documents.title: breakingpost-mortem taking place in murder investigation
text: a post-mortem examination of a boy at the centre of a murder investigation will take place this afternoon .
the primary school boy 's body was discovered by police at bromsgrove cottages in faringdon on tuesday afternoon , and a 40-year-old woman has been arrested .
police remain at the property , and the child 's next of kin have been informed .

documents.title: faringdon murder probe reaction
text: residents have been reacting to the news a boy has been found dead in the town and a woman arrested on sus of murder .

documents.title: oxford university summer school taster for welsh students
text: high-achieving teenagers from wales will have a chance to sample life at oxford university in a collaboration with the welsh government .
sixth formers who are part of the seren network will be invited to apply for a place at a four-day summer school at jesus college , oxford .
they will try out student life and attend lectures in august .
the summer school is thought to be the first aimed specifically at welsh students .

documents.title: terminally-ill oxford fan grateful after being added to team
text: the daughter of steve dyer , the terminally-ill oxford united fan added to the squad for the rest of the season , has said thank you on our facebook page .
gemma dyer wrote : `` my dad is so thankful ❤ thank you everyone for the support .
it means the world to him . ''
steve was admitted to a hos on friday , prompting messages of support from fans and club chairman darryl eales .
now the club has given him the number 12 shirt on the official squad list in the match programme .

documents.title: appleton 's concern for 'jaded ' oxford
text: appleton 's concern for 'jaded ' oxford

documents.title: 'big police presence continues in faringdon '
text: there 's a fairly big police presence here in faringdon .
the cottage where the boy 's body was discovered has been cordoned off and a forensic tent is in place where detectives are continuing to investigate what happened .
some members of the community have started to leave flowers .
one message said : `` rip young man . ''
author: Adina Campbell
BBC South Today

documents.title: police murder enquiries continuing in faringdon
text: in faringdon police have started a murder investigation after a boy 's body was found in a cottage .
i 'll be live at 1330 @ twitterid

documents.title: appleton admits u 's 'second-best ' at oldham
text: oxford united head coach michael appleton had no complaints as his side saw their league one play-off push dented with defeat by oldham .
the u 's went down 2-1 at boundary park .
on tuesday and stay 10th , six points off the play-offs with 10 games remaining .
`` we were second-best and ultimately , we finished second-best , '' appleton told bbc radio oxford .
`` there were one or two players out there who looked jaded on a pitch that was difficult at times .
`` i got the impression , and i hope i 'm wrong , the we look like a side that has got one big game left this season . ''
oxford face another four league one fixtures before their date at wembley in the efl trophy final against coventry city on 2 april .
author: Adam Williams
BBC Sport

documents.title: flowers laid outside murder investigation site
text: flowers from residents in faringdon have been laid outside the site of a murder investigation .
thames valley police launched the investigation after a boy of `` primary school age '' was found dead at bromsgrove cottages at 13:20 on tuesday .
one of the cards simply reads : `` rip young man . ''

documents.title: this morning 's weather with bee tucker
text: this morning 's weather with bee tucker

documents.title: today 's oxford mail front page
text: today 's oxford mail front page

documents.title: oxford 's alison dawes at the scene in faringdon
text: police tape remains around the line of cottages and uniformed and plain clothes officers are coming and going as the investigation continues .
news that something serious had happened spread rapidly on social media last night .
this morning passers by are saying they are shocked and saddened by what 's happened .
one lady walking to school with her son stopped to give a rose to one of the police officers monitoring the cordon .

documents.title: breakingdead child in faringdon was 'primary-school age ' boy
text: thames valley police have said the dead child found in faringdon yesterday was a `` primary-school age '' boy .
police were called to at a home at bromsgrove cottages in faringdon at around 13:20 gmt on tuesday .
a woman has been arrested on sus of murder , thames valley police said .
the child 's next of kin have been informed .

documents.title: the murder investigation scene in faringdon
text: the murder investigation scene in faringdon

documents.title: at the scene this morning in faringdon
text: oxford news editor alison dawes is at the scene of a suspected murder in faringdon .
she said : `` there is still an obvious police presence here this morning , with police tape around bromsgrove cottages , and police vehicles and officers nearby .
`` the scene is in quite a visible place opposite the fire station , and a lot of people come past here .
`` police have said this morning 's shocking discovery is likely to have a very direct impact on the community . ''
author: BBC Radio Oxford

documents.title: increased faringdon police presence
text: an increased police presence was being provided in the area on tuesday `` to provide reassurance '' .

supt rory freeman , local police area commander for south and vale of white horse , said : `` this is a very shocking discovery and i am aware it may have a very direct impact on the community of faringdon .

`` in light of this incident there will be an increased police presence in the area to provide reassurance and we would advise any members of the community affected by this incident to speak to one of the neighbourhood policing team . ''

documents.title: murder probe as young child found dead in faringdon
text: a young child has been found dead at a property in oxfordshire , prompting a murder investigation .
police found the child after being called to at a home at bromsgrove cottages in faringdon at around 13:20 gmt on tuesday .
a woman has been arrested on sus of murder , thames valley police said .
the child 's next of kin have been informed .
anyone with information is asked to call 101 quoting 730 .
